Made of durable resin material and natural brown colors are vivid and not washed out.
Makes the tank look realistic and add much fun for the fish.
There are 3 holes on the trunk fish decor, your lovely pet betta or other smaller fish would be super happy to go in and out the trunk cave to sleep, rest, hide, play, breed

short_description: This cave while being a great hideout for reptiles and amphibians is also an amazing viewing experience for the owner! Watch through the glass as your reptile interacts with the cave. It fits perfectly into the corner and is uderground making use of extra space previously not used space!

This reptile cave is the ideal environment for your small reptile companions with this specialized humid hide. This cave will offer your reptile the ability to regulate their humidity levels, promoting healthy shedding, facilitating egg laying, and increasing their comfort.

Improve reptiles quality of life. The Reptile Cave allows them to fulfill their natural habits of climbing, exploring and hiding! Reptile are natually curious and need places to explore and hide. The Reptile Cave will fullfill this need by adding enrichment to the habitat! This hide is perfect for many different reptiles; Anoles, Crested Geckos, Leopard Geckos, Hognose Snakes, Corn Snakes, Lizards and much more!

Made in USA. The Reptile Corner Underground Cave Viewing Hide is made with reptile safe plastic.

name: Natural Coconut Shell Hideout Cave, 5" Aquarium Fish & Reptile Hide Cave, Leopard Gecko Tank Accessories, Crested Geckos, Hermit Crabs, Spider, Snails & Small Lizards Climbing Toy & Decor
short_description: Sized for Small Pets: Compact 5 x 2.4 inch coconut shell reptile hide is ideal for small lizards, leopard gecko tank accessories, hermit crab accessories, tarantulas, spiders, and dwarf frogs, giving them a secure place to rest in reptile & amphibian habitat hideouts or nano tanks.

Cozy Retreat for Shy Pets: Creates a shaded, secure shelter that helps nervous species feel safe in their habitat. An ideal addition to any small bioactive setup, serving as both a ground-level refuge and an enriching tank accessory for leopard geckos, crested geckos, and other small reptiles.

Natural Humid Hide Option: Add moist moss or substrate inside to use as a general humid hide, supporting healthy shedding in geckos and other small reptiles. Works beautifully with other natural reptile decor, substrate, and reptile & amphibian habitat plants as part of your reptile terrarium tank accessories.

Climbing Toy & Enrichment: The rough, curved shell doubles as a fun hermit crab climbing toy and gecko toy, encouraging activity for small lizards, hermit crabs, and young geckos. Complements bearded dragon tank accessories for juveniles, and pairs well with chameleon accessories and chameleon cage accessories in compact arboreal setups.

Easy to Place in Any Setup: The low profile fits neatly into nano and small enclosures as lizard tank accessories, reptile & amphibian habitat hideouts, or minimalist bearded dragon accessories for babies. Use it in desert, tropical, or semi-aquatic tanks for hermit crab, small lizards, tarantula, or spider without taking up valuable floor space.
product_description: Designed specifically for smaller pets, this Favozio Natural Coconut Shell Hideout Cave (1 Pc) measures about 5 x 3 inches, making it an ideal shelter for small lizards, leopard gecko, crested gecko, hermit crabs, tarantulas, spiders, and tiny frogs. The real coconut shell offers a safe, natural reptile hide that helps your animals feel secure in their reptile & amphibian habitat hideouts without overwhelming compact enclosures. In the wild, small reptiles and invertebrates spend much of their time hiding under leaves, bark, and rocks, so providing a snug hide is essential for reducing stress and supporting natural behavior. This cave gives nervous pets like geckos and hermit crabs a quiet retreat, making it a valuable part of your leopard gecko tank accessories, gecko tank accessories, and crested gecko accessories collection. The coconut shell can also serve as a humid hide leopard gecko solution by adding damp moss or substrate inside, which can support healthy shedding and hydration in geckos and other small reptiles. Its organic look blends easily with soil, leaf litter, and reptile & amphibian habitat plants, enhancing your reptile decor while functioning as practical reptile tank accessories. Thanks to its textured surface, the hide doubles as a natural hermit crab climbing toy and gecko toy, offering enrichment for active species that love to climb and explore. It fits well alongside vines and hammocks in crested gecko tank accessories, juvenile bearded dragon tank accessories, and chameleon cage accessories for smaller arboreal or semi-arboreal pets. Compact yet functional, this coconut cave is easy to position in nano tanks, shelf enclosures, and desk-sized habitats. Whether you keep a single gecko in a small gecko tank, a hermit crab colony, or a terrarium of tiny invertebrates, this hide provides a cozy, natural retreat that supports comfort, security, and daily enrichment for your small companions.

name: Exo Terra Gecko Cave for Reptiles and Amphibians, Reptile Hideout, Medium, PT2865
short_description: Gecko Cave that provides a secure hiding for reptiles and amphibians
Integrates easily in desert and tropical terrariums
Having a resting place helps alleviate stress in reptiles and amphibians
Suitable for Frog Eyed Geckos, Rough Knob Tail Geckos, and Paroedura species
Provides a cooler microclimate, placing forest moss or Sphagnum moss in the cave will add moisture
product_description: The Exo Terra Gecko Cave makes the perfect addition to your gecko terrarium. A secure hide is an essential feature of the natural terrarium. A proper hiding area is often an underestimated and necessary feature of a natural terrarium. Without a safe spot to hide and sleep, reptiles and amphibians will easily develop stress that will affect their activity and appetite. Hideouts also provide a shelter and/or a cooler and moister area in the terrarium. Without a proper hide and sleeping area, geckos can easily develop stress that may affect their well-being and appetite. The natural look of the Exo Terra Gecko Cave can be easily integrated into any type of terrarium, and its sturdy design prevents it from being easily tipped over by larger geckos. The Exo Terra Gecko Cave is also extremely useful as nesting hide for various species of geckos. To create a moist hide just add moistened Exo Terra’s Forest Moss or Sphagnum Moss. Nesting hides should be kept moist at all times. Over the years, Exo Terra has become the market leader in reptile products for the natural terrarium. This achievement was made possible by the philosophy of successful, continuous innovation, which has become a basic underlying commitment, a culture and an attitude. Exo Terra has developed a complete line of terrariums and terrarium accessories, including glass terrariums, reptile terrariums, frog terrariums, turtle terrariums, snake terrariums, gecko terrariums, bearded dragon terrariums, small terrariums, large terrariums, terrarium humidifiers, terrarium heaters, terrarium thermometers, terrariums heat lamps, terrarium light bulbs, terrarium plants and terrarium decorations.

name: Reptile Hides and Caves – Leopard Gecko Tank Accessories, Natural Dome Reptile Cave & Shelter, Gecko Tank Accessories & Hermit Crab Shelter, Hamster Cage Accessories
short_description: Sized for Small Reptiles & More At 5.5×6.5×3 in with a 3×2.7 in opening, this dome fits hides for leopard geckos and small frogs. Also works as a snake hide, turtle cave, or hermit crab Shelter. Suitable for most reptile terrariums—recommended for enclosures larger than 3 gallons, with 10-gallon and bigger tanks providing an ideal fit.

Climbing & Hiding in One The moss-covered surface provides a tactile grip for climbing, while the hollow inside serves as a reptile hide or reptile cave. Great as a leopard gecko hide, hermit crab Shelter, or a shaded retreat for jumping spiders

Handcrafted Reptile Hide Built with a sturdy coconut shell interior for natural support, durable and long-lasting. Each dome is fully handcrafted—moss is wrapped by hand with twine, without glue. Because the shell is made from real coconuts, slight size differences may occur, and light shedding of moss can happen during use. These are normal features of handcrafted, natural materials.

Simple Habitat Setup Just place it in your terrarium—no tools required. Moss on the exterior should be lightly misted every 3–4 days to keep it fresh, while ensuring the habitat remains well ventilated. Can be used as part of reptile & amphibian habitat Shelters or paired with other gecko tank accessories.

Perfect for Leopard Geckos and Snakes Designed with ground-dwelling reptiles in mind, this hide matches the instincts of leopard geckos and snakes, who love to rest in enclosed, natural shelters. The moss exterior blends seamlessly with their survival habits, creating a more familiar environment.
